title: Scenario 5: Manager Panel State Verification
content:
Issue #47 Scenario 5: Manager Panel with Content Verification

**Purpose:** Verify Quick Tabs Manager Panel displays correctly with accurate state information.

**Test Location:** tests/extension/issue-47-scenarios.spec.js

**Key Test Steps:**
1. Create multiple Quick Tabs
2. Minimize one Quick Tab
3. Get Manager Panel state
4. Verify minimized count matches
5. Verify manager state is accurate

**Test Bridge Methods Used:**
- createQuickTab(url) - multiple calls
- getQuickTabs()
- minimizeQuickTab(id)
- getManagerState() - NEW METHOD

**Expected Behavior:**
- Manager state contains visible, position, size properties
- Minimized tabs count is accurate
- Manager panel lists all Quick Tabs with correct status

**Implementation Status:** âœ… Implemented with new test bridge methods

**Test Pattern:**
```javascript
await helper1.createQuickTab('https://wikipedia.org');
await helper1.createQuickTab('https://youtube.com');

const tabs = await helper1.getQuickTabs();
await helper1.minimizeQuickTab(tabs[0].id);

const managerState = await helper1.getManagerState();
expect(managerState.success).toBe(true);

const minimizedCount = tabs.filter(t => t.minimized).length;
expect(minimizedCount).toBe(1);
```

**Dependencies:** Quick Tabs Manager Panel, panelManager instance
